titles: The compleat angler being instructions how to angle for a trout or grayling in a clear stream.
author: Cotton, Charles, 1630-1687.
publisher: Printed for Richard Marriott and Henry Brome ...,
notes: The epistle dedicatory is signed: Charles Cotton.
Also issued as pt. 2 of The universal angler, 1676 (Wing W674).
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
